OBCQL_WIDGET_QUERY.HQL: select etlstatus.organization.name as organizationName,etlstatus.dcetlPosConfig.terminalName as Terminalname, etlstatus.eTLName as Etlname, etlstatus.lastAttemptedTime as Last_Attempted_Time, etlstatus.lastUpdatedTime as Last_Updated_Time, etlstatus.currentStatus as Current_Status from dcetl_etl_status etlstatus where etlstatus.organization.name like :organizationName and @optional_filters@
